name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Dawn of Glory
storyline: The World Serpent has revealed its fangs and Schicksal has aimed its lance. The arrival of Schicksal's strongest Valkyrie announces the end remains uncertain.
summary:
Version 3.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Elegy to Yesterday arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Valkyrie Gloria (Durandal)
• New Story Chapter XV: The Prodigal Girl Returns
• New Open World: A Post-Honkai Odyssey
• New Featured Event: Cybernet Havens
• ...and more!
